trans-unit.source: about_Remote
trans-unit.target: about_Remote

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: About Remote
trans-unit.target: 關於遠端

trans-unit.source: about_Remote
trans-unit.target: about_Remote

trans-unit.source: TOPIC
trans-unit.target: 主題

trans-unit.source: about_Remote
trans-unit.target: about_Remote

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Describes how to run remote commands in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何在 Windows PowerShell 中執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: You can run remote commands on a single computer or on multiple computers by using a temporary or persistent connection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用暫時或永久的連線，在單一電腦上或在多部電腦上執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also start an interactive session with a single remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用單一的遠端電腦啟動互動式工作階段。

trans-unit.source: This topic provides a series of examples to show you how to run different types of remote command.
trans-unit.target: 本主題提供一系列的範例，說明您如何執行不同類型的遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: After you try these basic commands, read the Help topics that describe each cmdlet that is used in these commands.
trans-unit.target: 您嘗試這些基本命令之後，讀取描述使用這些命令列中每個 cmdlet 的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: The topics provide the details and explain how you can modify the commands to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 主題提供詳細資料，以及說明如何修改以符合您需求的命令。

trans-unit.source: Note: To use Windows PowerShell remoting, the local and remote computers must be configured for remoting.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 若要使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能，在本機和遠端電腦必須設定的遠端執行功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Remote_Requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Remote_Requirements。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO START AN INTERACTIVE SESSION (ENTER-PSSESSION)
trans-unit.target: 如何啟動互動式工作階段 (ENTER-PSSESSION)

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to run remote commands is to start an interactive session with a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟動遠端電腦的互動式工作階段是最簡單的方式執行遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: When the session starts, the commands that you type run on the remote computer, just as though you typed them directly on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段開始時，您輸入的命令執行的遠端電腦上，就如同您直接在遠端電腦上輸入。

trans-unit.source: You can connect to only one computer in each interactive session.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在每個互動式工作階段中連接到只有一台電腦。

trans-unit.source: To start an interactive session, use the Enter-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟動互動式工作階段，請使用 Enter-pssession cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The following command starts an interactive session with the Server01 computer:
trans-unit.target: 下列命令啟動 Server01 電腦的互動式工作階段︰

trans-unit.source: Enter-PSSession Server01
trans-unit.target: Enter-pssession Server01

trans-unit.source: The command prompt changes to indicate that you are connected to the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 命令提示字元中的變更，以指出您已連接到 Server01 電腦。

trans-unit.source: Server01\PS>
trans-unit.target: Server01\PS >

trans-unit.source: Now, you can type commands on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 現在，您可以輸入命令在 Server01 電腦上。

trans-unit.source: To end the interactive session, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要結束互動式工作階段，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: Exit-PSSession
trans-unit.target: Exit-PSSession

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Enter-PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Enter-pssession。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO USE CMDLETS THAT HAVE A COMPUTERNAME PARAMETER TO GET REMOTE DATA
trans-unit.target: 如何使用 CMDLET 具有 COMPUTERNAME 參數來取得遠端資料

trans-unit.source: Several cmdlets have a ComputerName parameter that lets you get objects from remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 數個 cmdlet 都有 ComputerName 參數，可讓您從遠端電腦取得物件。

trans-unit.source: Because these cmdlets do not use WS-Management-based Windows PowerShell remoting, you can use the ComputerName parameter of these cmdlets on any computer that is running Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 因為這些 cmdlet 不會使用 WS 管理型 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能，您可以使用這些指令程式的 ComputerName 參數，任何正在執行 Windows PowerShell 的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The computers do not have to be configured for Windows PowerShell remoting, and the computers do not have to meet the system requirements for remoting.
trans-unit.target: 不需要設定為 Windows PowerShell 遠端電腦，電腦就不必符合系統需求適用於遠端處理。

trans-unit.source: The following cmdlets have a ComputerName parameter:
trans-unit.target: 下列指令程式都有 ComputerName 參數︰

trans-unit.source: Clear-EventLog Limit-EventLog Get-Counter New-EventLog Get-EventLog Remove-EventLog Get-HotFix Restart-Computer Get-Process Show-EventLog Get-Service Stop-Computer Get-WinEvent Test-Connection Get-WmiObject Write-EventLog
trans-unit.target: 清除事件記錄檔限制-事件記錄檔取得計數器新事件記錄檔取得-事件記錄檔移除 EventLog Get-HotFix 重新啟動電腦 Get-process Show-eventlog Get-服務停止電腦 Get-winevent 測試-連接 Get-wmiobject 寫入-事件記錄檔

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command gets the services on the Server01 remote computer:
trans-unit.target: 比方說，下列命令會取得 Server01 遠端電腦上的服務︰

trans-unit.source: Get-Service -ComputerName Server01
trans-unit.target: 取得服務 ComputerName Server01

trans-unit.source: Typically, cmdlets that support remoting without special configuration have a ComputerName parameter and do not have a Session parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，支援遠端處理而不需要特殊設定的 Cmdlet 具有 ComputerName 參數而沒有 Session 參數。

trans-unit.source: To find these cmdlets in your session, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要在您的工作階段中尋找這些 Cmdlet，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: Get-Command | where { $.Parameters.Keys -contains "ComputerName" -and $.Parameters.Keys -NotContains "Session"}
trans-unit.target: Get 命令 |其中 {$。Parameters.Keys-包含 「 電腦名稱"-和 $。Parameters.Keys NotContains 「 工作階段 」。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO RUN A REMOTE COMMAND
trans-unit.target: 如何執行遠端命令

trans-unit.source: To run other commands on remote computers, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在遠端電腦上執行其他命令，使用 Invoke-command cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To run a single command or a few unrelated commands, use the ComputerName parameter of Invoke-Command to specify the remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行單一命令或幾個不相關的命令，請使用 Invoke-command 的 ComputerName 參數來指定遠端電腦。

trans-unit.source: Use the ScriptBlock parameter to specify the command.
trans-unit.target: 指定的命令使用 ScriptBlock 參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command runs a Get-Culture command on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令來執行 Get-culture 命令在 Server01 電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command -ComputerName Server01 -ScriptBlock {Get-Culture}
trans-unit.target: 叫用命令 ComputerName Server01-ScriptBlock {Get-culture}

trans-unit.source: The ComputerName parameter is designed for situation in which you run a single command or several unrelated commands on one or many computers.
trans-unit.target: ComputerName 參數的設計讓您執行單一命令或數個不相關的命令在一或多部電腦的情況。

trans-unit.source: To establish a persistent connection to a remote computer, use the Session parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立持續連線到遠端電腦，使用工作階段參數。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO CREATE A PERSISTENT CONNECTION (PSSESSION)
trans-unit.target: 如何建立持續連線 (PSSESSION)

trans-unit.source: When you use the ComputerName parameter of the Invoke-Command cmdlet, Windows PowerShell establishes a connection just for the command.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 的 ComputerName 參數時，Windows PowerShell 會建立只針對此命令的連接。

trans-unit.source: Then, it closes the connection when the command is complete.
trans-unit.target: 然後，在命令完成時，就會關閉連線。

trans-unit.source: Any variables or functions that are defined in the command are lost.
trans-unit.target: 任何變數或在命令中定義的函式都會遺失。

trans-unit.source: To create a persistent connection to a remote computer, use the New-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立持續連線到遠端電腦，請使用 New-pssession cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command creates PSSessions on the Server01 and Server02 computers and then saves the PSSessions in the $s variable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令在 Server01 與 Server02 電腦上建立 Pssession，並儲存 Pssession $s 變數中。

trans-unit.source: $s = New-PSSession -ComputerName Server01, Server02
trans-unit.target: $s = New-pssession-ComputerName Server01、 Server02

trans-unit.source: HOW TO RUN COMMANDS IN A PSSESSION
trans-unit.target: 如何在 PSSESSION 中執行命令

trans-unit.source: With a PSSession, you can run a series of remote commands that share data, like functions, aliases, and the values of variables.
trans-unit.target: PSSession，您可以執行一系列的共用資料，像是函式、 別名和變數的值的遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: To run commands in a PSSession, use the Session parameter of the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 PSSession 中執行命令，使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 的工作階段參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a Get-Process command in the PSSessions on the Server01 and Server02 computers.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令會使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 Pssession 中執行 Get-process 命令在 Server01 與 Server02 電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the processes in a $p variable in each PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 命令會將處理程序儲存在 $p 變數中每個 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command -Session $s -ScriptBlock {$p = Get-Process}
trans-unit.target: 叫用命令的工作階段 $s ScriptBlock {$p = Get-process}

trans-unit.source: Because the PSSession uses a persistent connection, you can run another command in the same PSSession that uses the $p variable.
trans-unit.target: 因為 PSSession 使用的持續連線，您可以執行另一個命令中使用 $p 變數的同一個 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: The following command counts the number of processes saved in $p.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會計算儲存在 $p 的處理序數目。

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command -Session $s -ScriptBlock {$p.count}
trans-unit.target: 叫用命令的工作階段 $s ScriptBlock {$p.count}

trans-unit.source: HOW TO RUN A REMOTE COMMAND ON MULTIPLE COMPUTERS
trans-unit.target: 如何在多部電腦上執行遠端命令

trans-unit.source: To run a remote command on multiple computers, type all of the computer names in the value of the ComputerName parameter of Invoke-Command.
trans-unit.target: 若要在多部電腦上執行遠端命令，輸入電腦名稱中所有叫用命令的 ComputerName 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: Separate the names with commas.
trans-unit.target: 以逗點分隔名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command runs a Get-Culture command on three computers:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令來執行 Get-culture 命令在三部電腦上︰

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command -ComputerName S1, S2, S3 -ScriptBlock {Get-Culture}
trans-unit.target: Invoke-command-ComputerName S1、 S2、 S3-ScriptBlock {Get-culture}

trans-unit.source: You can also run a command in multiple PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在多個 Pssession 中執行命令。

trans-unit.source: The following commands create PSSessions on the Server01, Server02, and Server03 computers and then run a Get-Culture command in each of the PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令在 Server01、 Server02 和 Server03 電腦上建立 Pssession，然後再執行每個 Pssession 中的 [Get-culture 命令。

trans-unit.source: $s = New-PSSession -ComputerName S1, S2, S3 Invoke-Command -Session $s -ScriptBlock {Get-Culture}
trans-unit.target: $s = New-pssession-ComputerName S1、 S2、 S3 叫用命令的工作階段 $s ScriptBlock {Get-culture}

trans-unit.source: To include the local computer list of computers, type the name of the local computer, type a dot (.), or type "localhost".
trans-unit.target: 若要包含本機電腦的電腦清單，輸入本機電腦的名稱，輸入一個點 （.），或輸入"localhost"。

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command -ComputerName S1, S2, S3, localhost -ScriptBlock {Get-Culture}
trans-unit.target: Invoke-command-ComputerName S1、 S2、 S3 localhost-ScriptBlock {Get-culture}

trans-unit.source: HOW TO RUN A SCRIPT ON REMOTE COMPUTERS
trans-unit.target: 如何在遠端電腦上執行指令碼

trans-unit.source: To run a local script on remote computers, use the FilePath parameter of Invoke-Command.
trans-unit.target: 若要在遠端電腦上執行本機指令碼，使用 Invoke-command 的 FilePath 參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command runs the Sample.ps1 script on the S1 and S2 computers:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令來 S1 和 S2 電腦上執行 Sample.ps1 指令碼︰

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command -ComputerName S1, S2 -FilePath C:\Test\Sample.ps1
trans-unit.target: Invoke-command-ComputerName S1、 S2-FilePath C:\Test\Sample.ps1

trans-unit.source: The results of the script are returned to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼的結果會傳回至本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to copy any files.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要複製任何檔案。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO STOP A REMOTE COMMAND
trans-unit.target: 如何停止遠端命令

trans-unit.source: To interrupt a command, press CTRL+C.
trans-unit.target: 若要中斷命令，請按 CTRL + C。

trans-unit.source: The interrupt request is passed to the remote computer where it terminates the remote command.
trans-unit.target: 插斷要求會傳遞到遠端電腦則會終止遠端命令。

trans-unit.source: FOR MORE INFORMATION
trans-unit.target: 詳細資訊

trans-unit.source: -- For information about the system requirements for remoting, see about_Remote_Requirements.
trans-unit.target: --對於遠端處理的系統需求的相關資訊，請參閱 about_Remote_Requirements。

trans-unit.source: -- For help in formatting remote output, see about_Remote_Output.
trans-unit.target: --如需設定遠端輸出格式的說明，請參閱 about_Remote_Output。

trans-unit.source: -- For information about how remoting works, how to manage remote data, special configurations, security issues, and other frequently asked questions, see about_Remote_FAQ.
trans-unit.target: --對於遠端處理如何運作，如何管理遠端資料、 特殊組態、 安全性問題，以及其他常見的問題的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Remote_FAQ。

trans-unit.source: -- For help in resolving remoting errors, see about_Remote_Troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: --對於解決遠端處理錯誤的說明，請參閱 about_Remote_Troubleshooting。

trans-unit.source: -- For information about PSSessions and persistent connections, see about_PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: --對於 Pssession 和持續連線的相關資訊，請參閱 about_PSSessions。

trans-unit.source: -- For information about Windows PowerShell background jobs, see about_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: --對於 Windows PowerShell 背景工作的相關資訊，請參閱 about_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: KEYWORDS
trans-unit.target: 關鍵字

trans-unit.source: about_Remoting
trans-unit.target: about_Remoting

trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.target: about_PSSessions about_Remote_Disconnected_Sessions about_Remote_Requirements about_Remote_FAQ about_Remote_TroubleShooting about_Remote_Variables Enter-pssession Invoke-command New-pssession
